description: Indulge in sticky-sweet pulled pork that's glazed in a maple and mustard sauce. This recipe is a winter warming winner on a chilly night.
name: Sticky Maple & Mustard Pulled Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 kg Woolworths Australian boneless roast pork shoulder

recipeInstructions.text: Heat mash according to packet instructions. Using 2 forks, shred pork. Divide mash among plates. Top with pork and sprouts. Drizzle with pan juices and serve scattered with thyme.
